features.name: add_feature
features.description: Allows user to add a feature.

features.name: add_group
features.description: Allows user to add a group to the system.

features.name: add_subdomain
features.description: Allows user to add a subdomain to the system.

features.name: add_ungrouped_feature
features.description: Allows user to add a superuser-level feature.

features.name: clear_history
features.description: Allows a user to completely clear the entire media review history for a group.

features.name: create_group_admins
features.description: Allows a user make any user an administrator for all existing groups.

features.name: delete_feature
features.description: Allows user to delete a superuser-level feature.

features.name: delete_group
features.description: Allows user to delete a group from the system.

features.name: delete_subdomain
features.description: Allows user to delete a subdomain from the system.

features.name: delete_ungrouped_feature
features.description: Allows user to delete a superuser-level feature.

features.name: test_feature
features.description: This feature exists for testing purposes.
